title: Spicy lemon chicken with peppers
ingredients: ['200g natural low-fat yoghurt', '3 tbsp lemon juice', '2 tbsp mild curry paste', '2 tsp chopped fresh thyme or 1/2 tsp dried', '8 chicken thighs', '30g butter', '1 large red pepper, deseeded and diced', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper', 'sprigs of fresh thyme to garnish']
